lifeGoals.title: Quit Smoking
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Gradually reduce nicotine intake; consider therapy or a support program; celebrate small victories each week.

lifeGoals.title: Exercise
milestones: Join a gym or home workout routine
Increase to 5x per week after one month
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Start with baseline fitness, pick fun activities (like spinning or classes), and ramp up gradually to make exercise a habit.

lifeGoals.title: Retirement
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Increase your savings rate by 10% each year, use tax-advantaged accounts, rebalance investments, and review progress annually.

lifeGoals.title: Start the RIA
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Define your niche market, handle all legal registrations, set up a compliance system, and develop a marketing strategy to grow your client base.

lifeGoals.title: Eat Better
milestones: Add more fruits & veggies each day
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Replace processed foods with fresh produce, plan & prep meals in advance, and keep a daily food log to stay consistent.

lifeGoals.title: Buy a New Car
milestones: Negotiate price or secure best deal
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Save up a down payment over the next year, compare loan rates, research reliable models, and finalize your purchase with strategic negotiation.

lifeGoals.title: Refinish Basement
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Create a layout that adds functional living space, collect at least three contractor bids, and keep a contingency budget for surprises.

lifeGoals.title: Clean Up Backyard
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Clear all clutter, trim plants, and consider raised beds or decorative mulch. Establish a maintenance schedule so it stays neat all season.
